data_sources.description: Training dataset containing features and labels for model training.
Test dataset containing features for model evaluation.

data_variables.name: train_df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the training data, initially read from train.csv.

data_variables.name: test_df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the test data, initially read from test.csv.

data_variables.name: train_df_1
data_variables.description: Subset of train_df with int64 features having less than 10 unique values.

data_variables.name: train_df_2
data_variables.description: Subset of train_df with remaining features (other than int64).

data_variables.name: new_train_df
data_variables.description: Final training DataFrame used after splitting the original train_df.

data_variables.name: new_test_df
data_variables.description: Test DataFrame used after splitting the original train_df.

data_variables.name: X_train
data_variables.description: Features for training extracted from new_train_df.

data_variables.name: y_train
data_variables.description: Labels for training extracted from new_train_df.

data_variables.name: X_test
data_variables.description: Features for testing extracted from new_test_df.

data_variables.name: y_test
data_variables.description: Labels for testing extracted from new_test_df.

data_flow.flow: Used for data cleaning, preprocessing, and final model training.
Cleaned and used to evaluate the final model performance.
Used for exploratory data analysis and feature selection.
Used for validation and performance metrics.
Used as input to the RandomForest model.
Used as the target in model training.
Used to evaluate the model performance.
Used to validate performance of predictions.
